reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown pointed out that the removal of ovl_lock_rename_workdir() is incomplete because another commit (833d2b3a072f) removed its last use in a different branch, and suggested that the patch should be updated to handle this case.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein questioned the removal of ovl_lock_rename_workdir() and asked for clarification on what it was fixing, also expressing concerns about the new locking rules in ovl_create_real().

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed the patch series and provided Reviewed-by tags for all patches except PATCH 04/13, where he pointed out a minor issue that needs to be fixed.
sentiment_signals: Provided Reviewed-by tags for most patches
